Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Agent/Antigen/Vaccine Antigen/Mutated Ras Peptide/K-RAS VAL-12 Mutant Protein
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic form of the K-ras protein containing a point mutation at position 12 (glycine to valine). Vaccines using mutant K-ras proteins may be used in the immunotherapy of various cancers that express mutated K-ras proteins. (NCI04)
